name: Fat Man Jump in Space (Beta)
description:
Fat Man Jump in Space. 

Stan is a Ex Comic Book store owner who wanted to go and do other things. Now he goes around space travelling from portal to portal collecting as much food from planets as he can handle. 

Controls: Arrow keys:

Left Arrow - Move Left 

Right Arrow - Move Right 

Space Bar - Jump 

WASD:

d- Move Right

a - Move Left

Space Bar - Jump 

Game Pad (Xbox 360 - ONE, Duelshock 4 ) 

Left D-Pad - Move Left

Right D-Pad - Move Right 

A button - Jump

Remember this is a Beta so there are some bugs.  Please leave any bugs in the comments so i can to fix them.  Please show some support because i am a growing games designer.
